title: 需要一个1.10.2的木牌显示计分板的格式
author: Real_Scl
txt_content:
·。· 如题，我用1.8.1的，规范了格式也还是继续显示不出计分板来
/blockdata 282 64 72 {Text1:"{"text":"","extra":[{"text":"场地规格","color":"black","bold":true}]}",Text2:"{"text":"","extra":[{"text":"长度：","color":"black","bold":true},{"score":{"objective":"length","name":"@e[type=ArmorStand,tag=Count1]"},"color":"black","bold":true}]}",Text3:"{"text":""}",Text4:"{"text":""}"}复制代码

replies.author: absent-cyd
replies.txt_content:
该功能在1.10.2下有bug，很多人都有反馈。
尝试更新到1.11.x版本来解决。
